name: Norm Koger's The Operational Art of War 3
name_original: Norm Koger's The Operational Art of War 3
description:
Norm Koger's The Operational Art of War 3 is a strategy game developed by Norm Koger and The Operational Art Development Team. It came out on 05-06-2006. Matrix Games published the game.
Norm Koger's The Operational Art of War 3 is available on PC.
